snippet: Rafael Nadal went from being scheduled for a busy-as-can-be Wednesday to a day off at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, thanks to rain that forced postponement of all 26 matches....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal went from being scheduled for a busy-as-can-be Wednesday to a day off at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, thanks to rain that forced postponement of all 26 matches.

headline.print_headline: Rain, Rain, Go Away: All 26 Rio Tennis Matches Postponed
headline.main: Rain, Rain, Go Away: All 26 Rio Tennis Matches Postponed
